content:
Lithuanian Foreign Minister Gabrielus Landsbergis responded to a massive rocket strike in Ukraine.

He is about itwroteIn his Twitter.

“We suppressed weapons supplies, we were unable to provide sufficient air defense, and now we ask the Ukrainians to sit with their hands while the winged missiles fall on their families. Such errors determine the course of the whole century. And none of them there is no excuse, ”Gabrielus Landsbergis wrote.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the night of March 22, enemyDrewcombined rocket and aviation strike on the objects of critical infrastructure of Ukraine. Anti -air combat destroyed 92 air targets. The blows damaged the energy infrastructure, housing, civilian facilities in 15 regions.

High EU Representative on Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Josep Borrel as wellcommentedRussia's large -scale attack against Ukraine and stated that Russia threatens the security of the ZPP.

Estonian Foreign Minister Margus Tsakhkn is decisiveHe condemnedCombined blows using drones and missiles in cities of Ukraine.
title: Lithuanian Foreign Minister about Russian missile attack in Ukraine: our mistakes are not justified
description: He wrote about this on his Twitter.    "We suppressed the supply of weapons, we couldn't...
author: Army Inform
